description: This script seeds initial skill categories, skills, lessons, quizzes, and badges into a MongoDB database for a skill learning platform. It performs database index creation, upserts for skills and lessons, and builds quiz and lesson content dynamically.

methods.name: str slugify(text: str)
methods.description: Converts a string into a URL-friendly slug by lowercasing, trimming, removing non-alphanumeric characters, and replacing spaces with hyphens.

methods.name: List[Dict] build_quiz(topic: str)
methods.description: Generates a simple quiz consisting of multiple-choice questions based on the given topic.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] build_lesson_content(skill_name: str, summary: str)
methods.description: Creates a lesson title and markdown content for a given skill name and summary.

methods.name: seed()
methods.description: Main asynchronous function that connects to MongoDB, creates indexes, and upserts seed data for skills and lessons.

ctags.name: build_lesson_content
ctags.pattern: /^def build_lesson_content(skill_name: str, summary: str) -> Tuple[str, str]:$/
